customer_addr:
S-2986-A Garner Hill Road
Hillsboro, WI 54634

citations.narrative:
The area where #65 has her litter of puppies temporarily housed has surfaces that they contact that cannot be readily
sanitized (bare wood and soil). To help protect dogs from germs, surfaces that dogs contact need to be of the type that
can be readily cleaned and sanitized or replaceable if worn or soiled. The facility representative said they plan to move
the puppies very soon to an area in the kennel that can be readily cleaned and sanitized. Ensure surfaces that dogs and
puppies are housed on can be readily cleaned and sanitized or replaceable if worn or soiled.
Correct by 10/16/2023.

Mixed breed F dog #65 has burrs matted in her tail. Burrs matted in fur can cause discomfort. For the health of this dog,
ensure to gently remove or clip out the burrs and contact your attending veterinarian if the burrs are not easily removed.
Ensure to maintain dogs' coats free from matting and burrs.
Correct by 10/16/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(ix) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
The area where #65 has her litter of puppies temporarily housed has surfaces that they contact that cannot be readily 
sanitized (bare wood and soil). To help protect dogs from germs, surfaces that dogs contact need to be of the type that 
can be readily cleaned and sanitized or replaceable if worn or soiled. The facility representative said they plan to move 
the puppies very soon to an area in the kennel that can be readily cleaned and sanitized. Ensure surfaces that dogs and 
puppies are housed on can be readily cleaned and sanitized or replaceable if worn or soiled. 
Correct by 10/16/2023. 
3.13(a)(4) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
Mixed breed F dog #65 has burrs matted in her tail. Burrs matted in fur can cause discomfort. For the health of this dog, 
ensure to gently remove or clip out the burrs and contact your attending veterinarian if the burrs are not easily removed. 
Ensure to maintain dogs' coats free from matting and burrs.  
Correct by 10/16/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
